content.html: I just don’t think we need another Batman movie. Sorry. We just don’t. To be clear, I’m going to see it on day one, and I’m going to love it. Also Zöe Kravitz, but that still doesn’t mean it should’ve been made.
content.value:
I just don’t think we need another Batman movie. Sorry. We just don’t. 

To be clear, I’m going to see it on day one, and I’m going to love it. Also Zöe Kravitz, but that still doesn’t mean it should’ve been made.
